#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
const int MAXN = 1e3 + 9;
 
int dp[MAXN];
int cnt[MAXN];
int prev[MAXN];
int tc;
string s;
 
int main (){
	scanf("%d",&tc);
	while(tc--){
		memset(cnt,0,sizeof(cnt));
		memset(prev,-1,sizeof(prev));
		memset(dp,0,sizeof(dp));
		cin >> s;
		for(int i = 0;i < (int)s.length();++i){
			cnt[s[i] - 'a']++;
		}
		int lastIdx = 0;
		for(int i = 0;i < 26;++i){
			if(cnt[i] == 0)
				continue;
			dp[i] = 1;
			for(int j = 0;j <= i - 1;++j){
				if(cnt[i] >= cnt[j]){
					if(1 + dp[j] > dp[i]){
						dp[i] = dp[j] + 1;
						prev[i] = j;
					}
				}
			}
			if(dp[i] > dp[lastIdx]){
				lastIdx = i;
			}
		}
		string ans = "";
		while(lastIdx != -1){
			ans += char('a' + lastIdx);
			lastIdx = prev[lastIdx];
		}
		reverse(ans.begin(),ans.end());
		cout << ans << "\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
